item.name: Mission Control Hacks
item.appendix: Move window to next/previous desktop by fn+[, fn+]
(Move mouse pointer to titlebar, and then press fn+[ or fn+])
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::FN, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT,
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::FN, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_MOUSEKEY_LOCK_BUTTON_LEFT,
